name: PostSummary
author: luciano Colombo

sections.description:
visit plugin homepage

PostSummary allow you to add a widget with a kind of preview of your posts. You can add a list like the newspaper sites
or a list of posts really similar to adsense style. You can mix your posts and adsense with the same aspect.
Every instance of the widget is independent and can be configured separately.
You can choose the categories to be displayed or if the lias is made of the most recent posts or, if you have statpresscn plugin,
the most read posts.
sections.installation:
1. Upload postsummary.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. go to apparence/widget page and add the PostSummary widget in your page
sections.faq:
How can I define the apparence style?

You have to manually edit the postsummary.css file or any css used in your theme.
In the Widget parameters page you write the style name

short_description: Postsummary creates a widget that contains a list of posts with title and the beginning of the text. You can style and add a thumbnail.
